name: Pregnant Mommy Check Up
description:
Nine-month is important for every pregnant mom's to check up her health for a new baby with this great game!

Features:
- physical examination checks the body temperature, blood pressure, heart rate look at the baby is normal.
- help the doctor complete the body examination.
- take care of the baby.

After a baby is born. there are lots of work that need to be finished like baby wash, baby dress-up, baby weight, baby height

Enjoy the experience of being pregnant and giving birth!
